summary: An alcoholic lawyer who successfully defended a notorious gambler on a murder charge objects when his free-spirited daughter becomes romantically involved with him.
cast: Norma Shearer|Leslie Howard|Lionel Barrymore|Clark Gable|James Gleason|Lucy Beaumont|Roscoe Ates|Ann Brody|Edward Brophy|Clarence Burton|James Donlan|Bess Flowers|Francis Ford|Henry Hall|George Irving|Edward LeSaint|Eric Mayne|Sam McDaniel|Lee Phelps|Frank Sheridan|Phillips Smalley|William Stack|Larry Steers|Carl Stockdale|Charles Sullivan|E. Alyn Warren|Claire Whitney
title: Un alma libre
